text: Tasha McCauley and Joseph Gordon - Levitt Gordon - Levitt married Tasha McCauley, who has an MBA and a degree in robotics, in 2014 and the couple has two children together. The family has chosen to stay as far away from the limelight as possible. ` ` She really doesn't want to be a part of it and you can imagine not wanting to have that kind of scrutiny,'' Gordon - Levitt told Howard Stern of his wife before they got married.
